coref_content: do blond have more fun" George Lucas, the director of Star Wars, ask blond in one of Formula One ’s most toe - curl podium interview after the Italian Grand Prix. as blond respond with a smile and an I hope so, " blond have no inkling of the controversy which would threaten blond's victory, as blond's Mercedes team be put under investigation by the steward over accusation that one of blond's tyre be under - inflate. in an extraordinary move, just as the national anthem be be play the FIA issue a press statement call for a his Mercedes team representative to go to the steward. his Mercedes team technical director Paddy Lowe admit to be confused. since the tyre drama in Belgium at the last race, manufacturer Pirelli have mandate a minimum starting tyre pressure of 19.5 psi as a safety measure. the report state that the left - hand rear Pirelli on his Mercedes team have be 0.3 psi below a minimum starting tyre pressure of 19.5 psi when measure on the grid, while team - mate Nico Rosberg have one tyre 1.1 psi below. because blond do not see the team engineer Peter Bonnington before the press conference, the first blond hear of investigation be when the moderator inform blond. his Mercedes team do n’t understand investigation, to be honest, " blond say. his Mercedes team set his Mercedes team's pressure fully supervise by the team engineer Peter Bonningtonmanufacturer Pirelli . the team engineer Peter Bonnington be perfectly happy with they as they be set. " his Mercedes team have ask blond to push just in case his Mercedes team be hit with a post - race 20 or 25 - second penalty. during the Italian Grand Prix blond be unimpressed at the team engineer Peter Bonnington's order on the 47th lap to push hard – especially as blond have a 22.5 - second cushion over Sebastian Vettel ’s Ferrari. blond celebrate his victory next to Sebastian Vettel ’s and Felipe Massa on the podium blond duly respond and cross the line 25.042sec ahead of Sebastian Vettel ’s, but as blond's crew congratulate blond and the team engineer Peter Bonnington promise to tell blond everything when blond see blond, blond respond : those last few lap be not cool, man. " blond add later : the call coincide with some degradation in the tyre and the car be slide more, and blond be try to figure out why blond have to start push again. it be a bit off - putting. " in the end, having debate the matter at length with his Mercedes team and manufacturer Pirelli engineer, the steward, who include former Indianapolis 500 winner Danny Sullivan, decide no further action be require. there be big sigh of relief all round – though not from blond. blond be with blond's engineer discuss the Italian Grand Prix, then listen to music and just chill, " blond say. blond be think about just what a good job his Mercedes team have do. at the time blond be ask to push blond could n’t even begin to think what any time penalty might be for, or why his Mercedes team might be push blond to open up a pit - stop window, but afterwards blond be n’t worried about investigation. " blond have dominate the Italian Grand Prix from the start, sit it out with Sebastian Vettel ’s go into the tight first corner, then steadily pull away from Sebastian Vettel ’s Ferrari with complete control en route to blond's 40th victory. blond have now have increase blond's point tally to 252 to Rosberg ’s 199 and Sebastian Vettel ’s's 178, put blond in a very good position with seven race leave. blond arrive at the Italian Grand Prix on a smoke motorbike the Ferrari - mad fan, the tifosi, cheer Sebastian Vettel ’s to the echo for Sebastian Vettel ’s's second place, having be aghast at the start when Kimi Raikkonen ’s car bogge down and drop from second to 14th. but as the Finn recover to a strong fifth place, there be disaster for Rosberg ’s. obliged to use an old - specification engine that have be use for the last six race, follow a problem with Rosberg ’s's new update engine on Saturday morning, Rosberg ’s have close to within 1.4sec of Sebastian Vettel ’s, on Rosberg ’s's Ferrari debut in Italy, by the 50th lap before the tired motor pack up. to have it explode two lap to the end be unbelievable and it be even more disappointing for sure, " say Rosberg ’s. Rosberg ’s be go to have a good go at Sebastian Vettel ’s because finally Rosberg ’s have the brake cool off to be able to attack. just when Rosberg ’s ’ve need to catch up in point, it ’s be the big loss that Rosberg ’s ’ve have in one day in the whole season, so the big loss that I ’ve have in one day in the whole season ’ very bad, " Rosberg ’s add. but Rosberg ’s keep go ; give up do n’t exist for Rosberg ’s, just keep fight and now Rosberg ’s ’ll just try and win the next couple of race. " the final podium position be resolve in Felipe Massa's favour by a scant 0.4sec after Felipe Massa's Williams team - mate Valtteri Bottas put Felipe Massa under intense pressure. they have run third and fourth early on until Rosberg ’s undercut they in the pit stop, but as Felipe Massa's tyre wear out his Williams team - mate Valtteri Bottas close in. Felipe Massa ’m too old for this, " Felipe Massa joke, after three final lap of high - speed pressure. Felipe Massa might have be order not to talk openly about they's gripe over manufacturer Pirelli's tyre, but Sebastian Vettel ’s be blisteringly outspoken at the prospect of Monza be drop from the F1 calendar as chief executive Bernie Ecclestone and the race organiser continue to argue over the cost of contract renewal for 2017. if we take Monza away from the F1 calendar for s****y money reason, you be basically rip our heart out, " Sebastian Vettel ’s say. the emotion here be incredible. you stand on the grid and look to the left and to the right, and people be just so happy to be part of it. ".
